attributes.action: We demand a second EU referendum, as the Leave campaign was built on lies.
attributes.additional_details:
Prominent Leave campaigners have reneged their 2 key campaign arguments, saying they shouldn't have made such promises.

Now the lies have been admitted to and the people of Great Britain are aware of this, we believe that more than 2% of the Leave voters would change their vote, which would change the result of the EU referendum.
attributes.background:
The Leave campaign was based on 2 fundamental lies, changes to immigration, and the promise of £350 million of funding for the NHS, per week.
Since the results key Leave campaigners have admitted to both being unobtainable and impossible.
